# [Plusdocs](https://app.plusdocs.com)

Plusdocs Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Plusdocs
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: app.plusdocs.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
